00041 class BigEndian16Bit {
00042     public:
00046         BigEndian16Bit(UINT16 v = 0)  { m_val.m_uint16 = v; }
00047 
00051         inline BigEndian16Bit(const LittleEndian16Bit& v);
00052 
00055         inline BigEndian16Bit& operator=(const LittleEndian16Bit& v);
00056 
00060         union {
00061             UINT8 m_uint8_ar[2];
00062             UINT16 m_uint16;
00063 
00064             struct {
00065                 UINT8 m_a;
00066                 UINT8 m_b;
00067             } m_uint8;
00068         } m_val;

00070 };

00097

00099                 UINT8 m_a;

00102                 UINT8 m_d;
00103             } m_uint8;

00190     typedef LittleEndian32Bit Native32BitBase;
00191 #endif

00280     m_val.m_uint8.m_b = v.m_val.m_uint8.m_b;
00281     return* this;

00332 
00333 #define ApoxiSwap16Bit(x)   ((UINT16) ((((UINT16) (x)) << 8U) | (((UINT16) (x)) >> 8U)))
00334 #define ApoxiSwap32Bit(x)   ((UINT32) (((UINT32) ApoxiSwap16Bit((UINT16) x)) << 16U) |      \
00335                                       (((UINT32) ApoxiSwap16Bit((UINT16) (x >> 16U)))))
00336 
00337 
00338 // use these macros to define 16/32 bit big / little endian constants
00339 #if defined(APOXI_BIG_ENDIAN)
00340 #   define ApoxiLittleEndian16BitConstant(x) ApoxiSwap16Bit(x)
00341 #   define ApoxiLittleEndian32BitConstant(x) ApoxiSwap32Bit(x)
00342 
00343 #   define ApoxiBigEndian16BitConstant(x) ((UINT16) (x))
00344 #   define ApoxiBigEndian32BitConstant(x) ((UINT32) (x))
00345 #else
00346 #   define ApoxiLittleEndian16BitConstant(x) ((UINT16) (x))
00347 #   define ApoxiLIttleEndian32BitConstant(x) ((UINT32) (x))
00348 
00349 #   define ApoxiBigEndian16BitConstant(x) ApoxiSwap16Bit(x)
00350 #   define ApoxiBigEndian32BitConstant(x) ApoxiSwap32Bit(x)
00351 #endif
